comments.author: MegaShane555

comments.text:
what I love about this video is how it highlights different people. Ali is 
just there to set the scene for the average normal, urban living people. 
The professor guy with the beard is the true intelligence in the room, 
there is no judgement from him, he just speaks to make a (valid) point. The 
guy next to him, thinks he is superior but in reality its just his narrow 
minded and ignorant perception. The Geek guy tried hard to be intelligent 
but lacks wisdom and is confused by satire. ﻿
